replies.body:
If a website tells you that you need people to click a certain link in order to gain points to get a paid game for free, it's a fake, and can sometimes (and usually does) give you a virus.
Don't even bother wasting your time looking at these things.
replies.body_tagged:
If a website tells you that you need people to click a certain link in order to gain points to get a paid game for free, it's a fake, and can sometimes (and usually does) give you a virus.
Don't even bother wasting your time looking at these things.
